fixes.name: Active Accounts Count
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted Tableau COUNTD([AccountID]) to DAX DISTINCTCOUNT and transformed the column reference to 'accounts+'[AccountID]. This is an aggregation (distinct count) so it is implemented as a measure.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The Tableau formula uses an aggregation (COUNTD), which maps to DAX DISTINCTCOUNT; aggregations must be created as measures.
